attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from Non magical weapons.

attribs.name: condition_immunities
attribs.current: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightening, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, poisoned, Prone, Restrained

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJPiS1tk65lgsFVHIpV_content
attribs.current: Upon successful hit the target is considered restrained unless they save. A restrained target takes 3 (d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJPho1jZZ1JGxNkRg-3_content
attribs.current: The Geist can see 60ft into the Ethereal Plane when its on the material, and vice versa

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJPi0pvvbxo7znxZErS_content
attribs.current:
The Geist can move through other creatures and object - doing so is considered difficult terrain.
Takes d10 Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJPiMcgl1asXMWXct2U_content
attribs.current: It makes two attacks with its chains
